snippet: AOL said its first-quarter revenue increased 2 percent, largely because of rising advertising revenue, and net income grew 23 percent.
abstract: AOL reports first-quarter profit of $26 million, up 23 percent from year-ago quarter; revenue was $538 million, up 2 percent from year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: AOL said its first-quarter revenue increased 2 percent, largely because of rising advertising revenue, and net income grew 23 percent.

headline.seo: AOL Says Ad Revenue Helped First-Quarter Earnings
headline.main: AOL Profit Rose in First Quarter; Shares Fall on Disappointing Ad Growth
headline.print_headline: AOL Profit Rose in First Quarter; Shares Fall on Disappointing Ad Growth
